resources.string: Fluffy, chattering, friendly and likes bread.
The beautiful and Has a Wonderful Meow.
The cool, curious, collected handsome doctor cat.
The iconic Amazing One and only orange chairman.

Lulu is a brown-coated cat with a white muzzle. He has yellow-golden eyes. If you look closely, you can see he has an M forehead mark. He has dark-colored paws and unlike the other cats, he has a bushy raccoon-shaped tail. He is one of the most mischievous, if not THE most mischievous one of all. He is a glutton, lunging for whatever treats he can find. He is always very hungry, often meowing loud to ask for treats. He often kicks out the other cats out of their comfortable spots. He often bites toys intensely during games, mostly dragonfly toys which are hard to pull free since Lulu has sharp canines. Although Lulu likes to eat, he refuses to eat meals that look scary, like a big prawn or an octopus. Lulu often takes great pride to pick fights with other cats in any case, often ending with other cats and him fighting.

Lala is an Napoleon Munchkin cat with a long white fur coat. Lala has bright blue eyes and a black blotch on her nose and like a Munchkin, she has short legs. She is hungry most of the time and even runs to quickly get the food. She also hates to be bathed, always trying to run away and meowing very loudly. Lala is a big fan of the cat wheel, she is very athletic and goes very fast on the wheel. Lala can jump the highest out of all the cats, around 2-3 meters. Lala panics the most when bathed. Lala tail is 32cm long.

DD is a Norwegian Forest Cat and he likes bread. He is very friendly and gentle as well as the fluffiest cat. He has long, creamy brown and white fur. He has bright yellow eyes. Due to such a huge coat of fur, many people may think that he is fat, he is actually quite slim. DD is very fond of boxes. He also loves pushing things off tables and counter tops such as bread. He is the only one who knows how to open cupboards and drawers. Despite being calm most of the time, DD can lose his patience. DD meow is a soft chatter. He hisses at any machine or toy which looks like a cat.

TT is an American Shorthair cat. She is one of the more territorial cats. TT is a tall, queenly cat with short, greyish-silver fur and sad olive-green eyes. She also has dark grey markings across her fur, which is seen on her head as well. She has a yellow spot on top of her nose. TT has a scar on her right eye due to having Feline Herpes when she was kitten, which is why the eye appears cloudy. As a kitten, TT was very skinny with a black pattern across the bridge of her nose, which indicated how very sick she was. She is very sensitive. TT can understand human language and she is very patient as well. She is also a very well-mannered lady and waits for her food. She also gets upset easily when she sees unknown people or animals. She is a big fan of the cat wheel.

Chuchu is a tri-colored Highland Fold. Chuchu is a fluffy longhaired cat with a tri-colored calico coat. She has bright yellow eyes with dark pupils. She also has a slightly smushed appearance to her face. She has a few dark brown, thin stripes on her forehead, small, folded ears and has a short, fluffy tail. She is also tall. She overall has more of a white fur color. She has an "M" on her forehead. Chuchu is the most timid cat. She has a very innocent behavior. Chuchu usually prefers to just sit around, does not take part in most of the games, and is very calm, though she can get frightened easily. As Chuchu grows older, she starts becoming more active and playful. Chuchu does care for everyone around her, as seen with her meek behavior.

Coco is a white-coated Highland Straight. Coco has white colored fur with big sky blue eyes. He has fluffy fur and a fluffy tail. Coco usually appears to be very calm, but in the past he was a mischievous cat. Coco dislikes food with strange smells and even makes a face when strange food is moved closer to him. Coco is not vocal at all as he meows only few times. He is the most timid cat, as he easily gets nervous and uncomfortable when he is taken to a vet. Coco hates the camera for unclear reasons. His pupils would swell up when the camera is brought near to him and he even punches it before running away. Coco grew up to be a trouble-making and naughty teenager. However, with time, Coco lost his mischievous personality and became calm and nice.

Momo is a Garfield-faced Exotic Shorthair. His name also means peaches in Japanese. Momo has ginger/orange fur and yellowish eyes. His face look a bit grumpy when seen closely. He is also very tall and long. He is rather stocky built, with a roundish face. He loves playing with toys and shows dislike being groomed by others. Momo is a very mischievous cat, but he mellowed out as he got older. He is very soft and when receiving an injection in a cat hospital, he could easily slip away and needed to be held tightly without escaping. He is also very tall and long, as seen when he was stretched during an X-ray at the hospital. He also feels uncomfortable when getting his claws trimmed. He seems to have a good sense of balance and athleticism, as he is shown to leap high. Momo thinks too much before doing something in the games arranged for the cats, getting confused to the point that he even stops what he is doing.
Go back to cats list screen.
Picture which shows gender of the cat.
